price.description: The price of the house in lakhs (Indian Rupees)

area.description: The total area of the house in square feet

status.description: The status of the house (Ready to move, Under Construction etc.)

value_dict.Ready to move: The house is ready for immediate occupancy
value_dict.Under Construction: The house is currently under construction and not ready for occupancy

bhk.description: Number of bedrooms in the house

bathroom.description: Number of bathrooms in the house

age.description: The age of the house in years

location.description: The location where the house is situated

builder.description: The builder who constructed the house
